title: Excalibur Rising Book One
description: 900 years ago, as Britain descended into the Dark Ages, a legend was born. Camelot, the Sword in the Stone, and Arthur, the High King who did not die. But where is the truth of this legend? Where are the ruins of fabled Camelot? Where is the record of Arthur in the unbroken lineage of England's kings? In a villa in Florida, a woman with violet eyes dreams of an ancient document. In a hotel room in Las Vegas, a renowned historian claims to have found the sword Excalibur, and dies a violent death at the hands of a one-eyed man. In London, a treasure hunter sets out to find the sword that cannot be, and the resting place of the king who could not exist. Powerful forces are at work, breathing life into the legend. At long last, Excalibur is rising. Book One of the Excalibur TrilogyThis is an alternate cover edition of ISBN 0692220054
author: Eileen Enwright Hodgetts
